unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist**

unnormalised: Hey Insta fam! Ever wonder if your followers are *actually* listening to your biryani recipes, or just scrolling past? New follower analytics are here to help!

unnormalised: Think of it as your social media kundali matching. Now, platforms are offering deeper dives into follower demographics â€“ age, location (are they really from Chennai, or just pretending?), and even interests.

unnormalised: Influencers like Priya Sharma from Delhi are already using these tools to target specific content. Forget generic ads; think tailored promotions for Diwali sweets!

unnormalised: Platforms are also helping filter out those pesky fake followers. No more boosting your ego with bots from who-knows-where. Authenticity is the name of the game, ya'll!

unnormalised: Some are even calling it the death of "spray and pray" marketing. Every rupee spent can now be tracked more effectively.

unnormalised: So, go ahead, analyze those followers. Is your audience actually craving your content, or just waiting for the next meme? Knowledge is power, my friends!
